entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LinearGradientBrush crashes app on launch on iOS #5812
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Can't Change Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor From a Theme Style File #5808
  • Can't use JS interop outside the context of a component in MAUI #5804
    .NET 7
  • Editor CursorPosition goes to start after adding any character to text #5803
  • Linux Wayland support #5801
    Future
  • WebView inside a StackLayout height calculation differs between Windows and Android. #5799
  • Editor WidthRequest does not work on iOS #5792
  • Editor's SizeChanged event does not get called #5791

Closed

  • [Windows] Crash on SwipeView setting the SwipeMode #4292
    6.0.300
  • IWindow.VisualDiagnosticsOverlay.Density is always 1 #5334
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView MAUI targets don't copy item metadata for *.razor files #5713
  • Blazor Maui project using Razor component with SkiaSharp fail #5725
  • Blazor Maui project calling JS function in Razor component using generated code ExampleJsInterop fail. #5726
  • BlazorWinFormsApp and BlazorWpfApp throw NullReferenceException when using ExampleJsInterop in .NET 6 Preview 3 #1245
    .NET 7
  • FontImageSource displays small box instead of requested font icon #5157
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Folder YOUR_APP.exe.WebView2 is always created by BlazorWebView #5779
  • Only MotionEventActions.Down in PlatformGraphisView? #5259
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Can not File.ReadAllText a json file #5796
  • [MacCatalyst] SearchBar in HorizontalStackLayout Crashes on App on Startup #5346
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • No Maui Project Template and error: Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks #5778
  • iFrame Automatically Opens Source in New Window at Initialization (iOS Blazor WebView) #5784
  • The screen is white on iOS when using Shell #5786
  • 'System.PlatformNotSupportedException', reason: 'Operation is not supported on this platform. (System.PlatformNotSupportedException) #5788
  • Why the namespace can not be found in maui Playforms but still compile success? #5785
  • The remote iOS simulator hangs with black screen #5787

PullRequests

Created

  • Updating TargetFrameworks condition value #5813
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
  • Remove NETSTANDARD1 defines #5809
  • Remove trivial calls to GetTypeInfo #5807
  • [ci] Add CoherentParentDependency="Microsoft.Maui.Graphics" #5806
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove unused cssFallbackTypeName on Element #5805
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Blazor] Initial support on for configuring WebView2 settings #5802
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Surface exception for not supported phone number on iOS PhoneDialer #5800
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Bug] [AppAction] [Android] Prevent AppAction double handling on Android #5793
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #5789
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix crash setting Execute mode in Windows SwipeItems #5798
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/SwipeView
  • Update BlazorWebViewHandler.Android.cs #5777
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Wire up WindowOverlay to the Window Density #5718
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Essentials Location Permissions Set result after cleanup of iOS LocationManager #5795
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Rename ApplicationId to ApplicationIdGuid for Windows #5695
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix ResourceDictionary template #5736
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.1

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Fixing image shadows on Windows #5763
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Made MaxLength property consistent across all platforms #5581
    area/controls 🎮
  • BlazorWebView public API tracking #5672
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Run all navigation through async update #5744
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Fix Android Radio Button #5773
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Add pending changes in Alerts (RTL, Keyboard) #5739
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Re-enable Shell Tests #5745
    area/shell 🐢
  • Add MAUI and WPF Blazor Hybrid XAML namespaces #5720
    area/Xaml </>, area/blazor 🕸️
